title: Textile, 1810–15
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave; blue and black printed; orange and yellow immersion dyed. (One color is a development of the other probably using a chromate.); many block marks present; size of the repeat unit is probably not the s
dimensions:
Warp: 96cm (371/2 in.) by weft: 63.5 cm (25 in.) Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Size of unit of repeat: 16 3/4 by 13 inches, in offset (half-drop )        alignment.
description: Two curving tree trunks, one sparse, the other with many leaves and flowers, in an offset alignment. Bright orange, yellow, blue and black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1810–15.
1810–15. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave; blue and black printed; orange and yellow immersion dyed. (One color is a development of the other probably using a chromate.); many block marks present; size of the repeat unit is probably not the s. Gift of Cora Ginsburg. 1987-70-1.
